ound's very uneven here, doubt that my alt form is gonna do us any good. I =

>

oks back to him.

, they're hard ta find."
>

>

 got used up."

ill in one piece."

<NEW>

The next leg of the journey is uneventful. The=
 path that the duo have
taken has become huge savannas, with the trees beco=
ming fewer and
fewer as they move across hundreds of open miles.

Dinosaurs=
 are plentiful but generally seen at a distance as well as
the mammals and =
other strange prehistoric beasts and birds. It would
seem that none of them=
 want to have anything to do with the Autobot
and the Maximal that trek acr=
oss their landscape.

Finally, in the distance Nightshift and Rat Trap can =
make out the dark
billowing clouds of smoke that would signify a volcanic e=
ruption. The
skies are darkening as the duo continue, the number of animals=
 and
other life is becoming less and less, as noxious clouds of black vapor=

roll across the land. However despite that both Rat Trap and
Nightshift=92=
s compasses are telling them that they are still going in
the direction of =
where the tower once stood.

At the moment there is still no signal from Ch=
eetor himself or sign of
his presence. But then again he was very much clos=
er when his signal
was cut off. However as they approach, it is becoming mo=
re and more
dangerous as the heat is begining to rise.

(TAG)

Preston
